--- Story Description ---
** As a [role]
** I need [function]
** So that [benefit]

--- Details and Assumptions ---
** [document what you know]
** Acceptance Criteria

--- Acceptance Criteria ---
** Given [some context]
** When [certain action is taken]
** Then [the outcome of action is observed]
